metadata.title: USN-5501-1 -- Django vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Django incorrectly handled certain SQL. An attacker could possibly use this issue to expose sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5501-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-django - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.18 python-django-doc - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.18 python-django-common - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.18 python-django - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.18 No subscription required
